Row.Text: 1 free Great Artist appears near the city where the wonder was built. Contains 3 slots for Great Works of Art [ICON_GreatWork_Art] which provide +2 theming bonus, if you fill the slots with Great Works of Art [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] from the same era. It must be built on flat Grassland or Plains next to a City Centre.
